ygData.msgSnippet: (People...we aren t officially voting right now.   I was just saying IR should be leader.  One of my characters will be bringing it up though, then ya all can

(People...we aren't officially voting right now.   I was just saying IR 
should be leader.  One of my characters will be bringing it up though, then 
ya all can vote no confidence)

Oblitertron/Nemesis Enforcer:



Oblitertron smiled evily as shots hit him and Radistor was trying to make 
peace.  Oblitertron opened his mouth, his optics glowing, an optic blast 
launching out at Radistor's chest, a "continous" burst of flames out at 
Radistor's face.

---

Nemesis Enforcer saw the battle getting worse off.  Raising his rifle, he 
fired off twenty rapid laser blasts at Lightmare from above, laughing evily.

===

Punch recieves Zardus' transmission.  "On my way!" he yelled.  "Punch, 
transform!" he yelled, going to robot mode, this mode as good as new.  He ran 
off to the Ark which wasn't really that far away for a Transformer.
